changeSet.author: Mike Esposito
changeSet.createView: select COUNT(DISTINCT(p.id)) as unique_providers_served from job_queue_batch j, providers p where j.status = 2 and j.organization_id not in ('0ab352f1-2bf1-44c4-aa7a-3004a1ffef12', '69c0d4d4-9c07-4fa8-9053-e10fb1608b48', 'c7f5247b-4c41-478c-84eb-a6e801bdb145') and (p.id::text = j.provider_id or p.provider_id = j.provider_npi)

select SUM(ARRAY_LENGTH(STRING_TO_ARRAY(patients, ','), 1)) as benes_requested from job_queue_batch where patients IS NOT NULL and submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' >= DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '8 day' and submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' < DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '1 day' and organization_id not in ('0ab352f1-2bf1-44c4-aa7a-3004a1ffef12', '69c0d4d4-9c07-4fa8-9053-e10fb1608b48', 'c7f5247b-4c41-478c-84eb-a6e801bdb145')

select COUNT(DISTINCT p.patients) as unique_benes_served from job_queue_batch j, lateral UNNEST(STRING_TO_ARRAY(j.patients, ',')) as p(patients) where j.patients IS NOT NULL and status = 2 and j.submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' >= DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '8 day' and j.submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' < DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '1 day' and j.organization_id not in ('0ab352f1-2bf1-44c4-aa7a-3004a1ffef12', '69c0d4d4-9c07-4fa8-9053-e10fb1608b48', 'c7f5247b-4c41-478c-84eb-a6e801bdb145')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT job_id) as bulk_calls FROM job_queue_batch WHERE is_bulk = true and submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' >= DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '8 day' and submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' < DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '1 day' and organization_id not in ('0ab352f1-2bf1-44c4-aa7a-3004a1ffef12', '69c0d4d4-9c07-4fa8-9053-e10fb1608b48', 'c7f5247b-4c41-478c-84eb-a6e801bdb145')

select COUNT(*) as everything_requests from job_queue_batch where is_bulk = false and submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' >= DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '8 day' and submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' < DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '1 day' and organization_id not in ('0ab352f1-2bf1-44c4-aa7a-3004a1ffef12', '69c0d4d4-9c07-4fa8-9053-e10fb1608b48', 'c7f5247b-4c41-478c-84eb-a6e801bdb145')

select COUNT(DISTINCT job_id) as since_requests from job_queue_batch where since IS NOT NULL and submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' >= DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '8 day' and submit_time AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' < DATE_TRUNC('week', now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/New_York' + INTERVAL '1 day') - INTERVAL '1 day' and organization_id not in ('0ab352f1-2bf1-44c4-aa7a-3004a1ffef12', '69c0d4d4-9c07-4fa8-9053-e10fb1608b48', 'c7f5247b-4c41-478c-84eb-a6e801bdb145')
